title: Can't Open League Launcher | Please Help Me.
body: I opened my computer today and when I click on the league launcher it says it stopped working and searches for solution then says cant be found and it closes, I can not play ;'(

replies.body: This error can happen when the client is trying to open but something is preventing it, usually some OS setting.  I suggest going over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this resolved for good.  Let me know if you have any questions!
